childMdx.excerpt: God grant me the honesty to live this lie, this failure which finds  form in the written word, and the humility never to mistake my limits…
Though no thought can get there, there is a tiny crack in the circle of self.   The shadows stretch far beyond what you can see, but there…
The moon has moved since I first arrived here: now the light breaks in unfettered by my balcony bars; pure and still as I breathe out and…
